skillTree.name: Gnoblar Pigback
skillTree.description: When the gnoblar horde goes to war, some bosses will ride atop another gnoblar in a "piggy-back" manner using their "pig-jousting" tactics to slay the enemy.

skillTree.name: Gnoblar Throne
skillTree.description: Carried aloft by the strongest Gnoblars this Warthrone enables its rider to survey and bellow orders to their disorganised followers.

skillTree.name: Rhinox
skillTree.description: Sometimes an especially pompous or foolhardy Head Honcho will keep a Rhinox as his personal pet and do his best to hang onto its back as he guides it into battle, often shortly before being trampled to death by it.

skillTree.name: Greater Girth
skillTree.description: This Head Honcho is almost the size of several large humies rolled into one. In fact, he ate those several large humies just yesterday.

skillTree.name: Impressive Wealth
skillTree.description: Mountains of gold and an overflowing scrap piles are bound to draw in the strongest of warriors.

skillTree.name: Sword Gnoblars
skillTree.description: A small handful of Gnoblars surround this Head Honcho their swords always ready to cut and carve.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield and encouraging unbridled carnage.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Iron Discipline
skillTree.description: Rule number one of being a leader is to be far more terrifying than the next braggard who thinks they ought to take your place.

skillTree.name: Lucky Little Git
skillTree.description: This Gnoblar miraculously seems to avoid misfortunes that would see an end to other Gnoblars.

skillTree.name: Biggest and Baddest
skillTree.description: Often seen strutting around like they own the place and anyone that thinks otherwise is getting a beating.

skillTree.name: Pig-Jousting Champion
skillTree.description: After surviving the Pig-Joust and winning this Gnoblar is hailed as a Champion!

skillTree.name: Troublesome
skillTree.description: This Head Honcho is particularly great at stirring up trouble and insurrection within the Gnoblar society.

skillTree.name: Big Bully
skillTree.description: This one enjoys abusing his lofty and protected position by strutting around the camp bullying everyone and everything around him.

skillTree.name: Scrap Collector
skillTree.description: This one collects what he needs, forever on a quest to acquire the 'resources' needed for his collection.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%
This character can loot scrap piles

skillTree.name: Camp Dweller
skillTree.description: This one would rather just get drunk in his own camp – with no intention of going out.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Scrappy Fighters
skillTree.description: Though their intelligence is as pitiful as their physique, one would be a fool not to fear the Gnoblars when massed in numbers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +2 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Persistent Fire
skillTree.description: The more, the deadlier, the merrier.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +5% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +6% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers and Rustbuckets units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pig Riders
skillTree.description: If there's one thing more horrifying than being rushed by a hulking, bloodthirsty beast, it's being rushed by Gnoblars riding atop each other in a "piggy-back" manner, using their "pig-jousting" tactics to slay (or at least irritate) the enemy.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +4 for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Pigback Tossers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tools of Destruction
skillTree.description: For all its slovenly appearance, the Gnoblar Scraplauncher is a devastating engine of destruction.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +5% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Gnoblar Scraplauncher units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Best Biters
skillTree.description: Even the biggest and most elite of their kind, like the Manbiters or Lucky Gits fight harder in the presence of a worthy leader.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +2 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beasts of the Mountains
skillTree.description: What the monstrous creatures of the mountains lack in guile, they more than make up for in their stubborn reluctance to die.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +4 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Richly Rewarded
skillTree.description: To the most brutal, vicious killer go the richest spoils.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12 for Gnoblars, Gnoblar Fighters, Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Gnoblars, Gnoblar Fighters, Manbiters, Ogrebiters and Lucky Gits units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Continuous Volley
skillTree.description: When pelting a helpless enemy with heavy projectiles is so much fun, why bother stopping?

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers, Rustbuckets and Gnoblar Scraplauncher units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Gnoblar Flingers, Trappers, Powder Sniffers, Rustbuckets and Gnoblar Scraplauncher units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ravenous Fighters
skillTree.description: When fearsome, brute strength is combined with terrifying speed, the petty weaklings among the enemy can only wet themselves in fear.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Pigback Tossers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Trained Beasts
skillTree.description: Driven by ravenous hunger, the beasts feast on the flesh of the fallen.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Sabretusk Pack, Rhinox Riders, Yhetees and Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Hardy
skillTree.description: One can never go hungry on a long march for as long as there are captives for the meat-pot.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gone Campin'
skillTree.description: Running a large camp is one thing. Running an effective camp is another entirely.

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Brutish Enforcers
skillTree.description: The grumblings of unrest tend to quiet when under threat of being crushed and eaten.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Pig Knight
backgroundSkills.description: A veteran of many pig jousting tournaments. A true hero of Pigbarter.

effects.description:
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Pigback Riders and Pigback Tossers units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Sludgesucker
backgroundSkills.description: "A Greenish-grey skin, yellow eyes, hates sunlight and looks like a fish? Yeah, this one is a Boglar, alright.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Regeneration" when fighting at sea

Leadership: +2 when fighting at sea
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Groinbiter
backgroundSkills.description: "Don't let him bite you. You have no idea where that mouth has been.."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(all units in army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Gnoblars and Gnoblar Fighters units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Gorespittle
backgroundSkills.description: "Used to be a flinger like you, then I took a pan to my nose and killed our previous boss. Good times"

effects.description:
Range: +10% for missile infantry units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +5% for missile infantry units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Farter
backgroundSkills.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

backgroundSkills.name: Flabby
backgroundSkills.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Daddy
backgroundSkills.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

backgroundSkills.name: Maw Preacher
backgroundSkills.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."

backgroundSkills.name: Scrap Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once valuable scrap is acquired, this one will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.
